hopobject.body:
The beagle synth will be a full featured MIDI synth based around the beagleboard. This project is to be a learning experience with the intention of exploring using DSP for music synthesis.
Initial Feature List
* Full MIDI support o MIDI hardware daughterboard o MIDI firmware * 3 oscillators o saw, square, triangle, pulse, and sine waves o Linear and exponential frequency modulation o Pulse width modulation o Detune * 3 filter types (1 actual filter) o Low Pass o High Pass o Band Pass o controllable cutoff and resonance * 3 Envelope Generators o Filter cutoff envelope o Filter resonance o Amp envelope * 2 Low Frequency Oscillators o Patchable to Osc, Filter, or Amp o saw square, tri, pulse and sine waves
Future Feature List
* On board control surface o Physical controls (KNOBS!!!) o Touch Screen * Additional oscillators, filters, envelopes, and LFOs * Programmable wavetables for osc and LFOs * Effects o Phaser o Reverb o Distortion o Chorus o Ring Modulation * Full patchability for modular synth like patches. * FM Synthesis * Additive Synthesis * Phase Distortion Synthesis
Initially it is intended to utilize the DSP functionality of the beagleboard to implement a synth with 3 oscillators, low pass, high pass, and band pass filters, 2 envelope generators, and 2 LFO's.
From there the the project may look into adding FM and additive synthesis features.
hopobject.shortdesc: DSP MIDI synthesizer based around the beagleboard
